**Example 1: 范例**



Input: 

```
tccli wedata RegisterEventListener --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --EventName mytest4 \
    --ProjectId 1 \
    --Type REST_API \
    --Key 20220729142629819
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "372eab9d-1f32-47f5-8cc1-69d84b2427a6",
        "Data": {
            "Result": true,
            "ErrorId": null,
            "ErrorDesc": null
        }
    }
}
```
